name: search_car_rentals
description: Search car rentals by filter. Indicate the `location_id` -> use `Search locations` api point

location_pickup.description: Location pickup code or id. Ex: JFK or 1365100023, use Search locations api point
location_pickup.title: Location Pickup

name: search_hotels
description: Get available hotels by the filter. Indicate the `location_id` -> use `Search locations`, check-in and check-out date

location_id.description: Location id, use Search locations api point
location_id.title: Location Id

page_number.description: Number of page Default: 0 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 500
page_number.title: Page Number

name: search_cars_locations
description: Search locations by name

name: hotel_details
description: Get all reviews and images of the hotel by hotel_id

offset_of_reviews.description: Offset of reviews Default: 0 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 1000
offset_of_reviews.title: Offset Of Reviews

name: search_hotels_locations
description: Search locations by name

name: search_flights_locations
description: Search airports and locations by name

name: search_flights
description: Search flights. Type: only `ONE_WAY`. Set location_departure and location_arrival, use `/flights/locations` api point. You can filter out tickets by price, max duration and number of stops

location_departure.description: Departure location code. Use Search locations api point
location_departure.title: Location Departure

number_of_passengers.description: Number of passengers Default: 1 Minimum: 1 Maximum: 7
number_of_passengers.title: Number Of Passengers

number_of_stops.description: Number of stops. 0 - is direct flight Default: 1 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 3
number_of_stops.title: Number Of Stops

duration_max.description: Duration max. Minutes Default: 2051 Minimum: 1 Maximum: 10000
duration_max.title: Duration Max

name: search_hotels_locations_by_geolocation
description: Search locations by coordinates. Set coordinates latitude and longitude

name: booking_details_of_the_hotel
description: Get hotel descriptions, prices and available booking options. Indicate the hotel_id, check-in and check-out date

name: seat_map
description: Gets the seat map of all flights in a contract bundle through the getFlightSeatMap endpoint

ppn_bundle.description: The ppn_bundle for the seat map. Can be retrieved from the ppn_seat_bundle of FlightContract, or FlightLookUp.
ppn_bundle.title: Ppn Bundle

sid.description: Session ID. Random string ex.: j10k11l12m13n14
sid.title: Sid

name: contract
description: Gets the contract for the PPN bundle provided by a flight return, departure, or combined (round trip/multi-city) through the getFlightContract endpoint

sid.description: Session ID. Random string ex.: j10k11l12m13n14
sid.title: Sid

ppn_bundle.description: The ppn_bundle for the seat map. Can be retrieved from the ppn_seat_bundle of Flight Contract, or LookUp
ppn_bundle.title: Ppn Bundle

convert_currency.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.
convert_currency.title: Convert Currency

name: search
description: Returns a contract for a flight round trip search through the getFlightRoundTrip endpoint

adults.description: Number of adults Default: 1 Minimum: 1 Maximum: 8
adults.title: Adults

page.description: How many pages the results are spread over. Used in conjunction with results per page.
page.title: Page

airline_filter.description: 2 Letter code used to specify which airline that has been used.
airline_filter.title: Airline Filter

convert_currency.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.
convert_currency.title: Convert Currency

results_per_page.description: Number of results per page. Used in conjunction with page.
results_per_page.title: Results Per Page

currency.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.
currency.title: Currency

description: Downloads a list of airports with IATA codes for Flight search

limit.description: Limits the number of results from the response. Default: 500

description: Gets airport and city ids for the air product related to words in passed string through the getAutoComplete endpoint

spellcheck.description: If the spell check is strict.

country_code.description: Filter by the country code of the hotel.

changes_since.description: Date/time to filter the hotels that have been updated on or after this date. This will discover the last_changed_date of hotels in inventory (inclusive of the selected date). Date should be in a valid ISO 8601: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601 (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss{UTC_Offset}) format.
changes_since.title: Changes Since

property_type_ids.description: Filter by property type ids. See the Property Type Filter Guide for more detail.

limit.description: Limits the number of results from the response. Default: 100
limit.title: Limit

name: hotel_reviews
description: This API returns a list of reviews

hotel_id.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.
hotel_id.title: Hotel Id

languages.description: Limits the number of results from the response.
languages.title: Languages

offset.description: Used with limit to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the nuber of properties to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.
offset.title: Offset

limit.description: Limits the number of results from the response. Default: 100
limit.title: Limit

order_by.description: CSV of sorting order metrics. Valid Options: creation_date, average_rating, or verified_guest followed by .asc or .desc.
order_by.title: Order By

only_verified_guests.description: Set on to only include only reviews with verified_guests. A verified guest is a guest that has had a review verified by aaa. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.
only_verified_guests.title: Only Verified Guests

name: search_express_results
description: Provides discounted Express (Cached) and Closed User Group (Live) Rates using the getExpress.Results endpoint.

rate_limit.description: Number passed to limit the number of rates returned. Defaults to returning all available rates
rate_limit.title: Rate Limit

limit.description: Limits the number of results from the response. Default: 100
limit.title: Limit

radius.description: Radius in miles the results are from
radius.title: Radius

limit_to_country.description: Limits results to country provided. Valid Options: true or false.
limit_to_country.title: Limit To Country

rate_identifier.description: A toggle to show if rate identifier is being passed. Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true. Rate is a string that is set for each hotel and holds all the information regarding the rate that we send to priceline.
rate_identifier.title: Rate Identifier

multiple_deals.description: Multi Rates are provided Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true.
multiple_deals.title: Multiple Deals

language.description: Language code: en-US, es-ES, fr-FR, pt-BR
language.title: Language

adults.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with children parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, adults=2 and children=2
adults.title: Adults

hotel_ids.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids (Semi Opaque Only)
hotel_ids.title: Hotel Ids

rooms.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants
rooms.title: Rooms

country_code.description: Pass the user s country to see rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.
country_code.title: Country Code

sort_by.description: Sort results by a given option. Default sort is by guest_score. Valid Options: gs = guest_score, sr = star_rating, lp = lowest_price, hp = highest_price, ds = distance, mp = most_popular.
sort_by.title: Sort By

currency.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.
currency.title: Currency

latitude.description: Search for property availability around a specific latitude coordinate.
latitude.title: Latitude

children.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with adults parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, adults=2 and children=2
children.title: Children

city_id.description: Accepts a single PPN City ID.)
city_id.title: City Id

longitude.description: Search for property availability around a specific longitude coordinate
longitude.title: Longitude

name: auto_suggest
description: This API will provide a list of possible cities and hotels for a given search string

string.description: Search string that will enable a list of selection to be listed to the traveller.
string.title: String

order.description: Method of ordering the results of the search. Valid options: asc or desc.
order.title: Order

get_cities.description: Include cities in search results. Valid Options: True or False.
get_cities.title: Get Cities

get_airports.description: Include airports in search results. Valid Options: True or False.
get_airports.title: Get Airports

combine_regions.description: Enables the spell check option for the search string using either true or false.
combine_regions.title: Combine Regions

spellcheck.description: Enables the spell check option for the search string using either true or false.
spellcheck.title: Spellcheck

sort.description: Enum: rank, name. Method of sorting the results. Valid options: rank, name
sort.title: Sort

show_all_cities.description: Will filter out cities with no hotels. Valid Options: False = filter out cities without hotels, True = show cities with and without hotels.
show_all_cities.title: Show All Cities

get_hotels.description: Include hotels in search results. Valid Options: True or False.
get_hotels.title: Get Hotels

max_results.description: Number passed is the maximum number of results returned.
max_results.title: Max Results

get_pois.description: Include Points of Interest in search results. Valid Options: True or False
get_pois.title: Get Pois

get_regions.description: Include Regions in search results. Valid Options: True or False.
get_regions.title: Get Regions

name: hotel_photos
description: This API returns a list of photos per hotel

hotel_ids.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids (Semi Opaque Only)
hotel_ids.title: Hotel Ids

image_size.description: The size of the image returned. Valid Options: small (60px), medium(300 to 312px) or large(500 to 800px)
image_size.title: Image Size

name: express_contract
description: Provides the hotel inventory and corresponding rates for Express (cache) or Closed User Group (live)

language.description: Language code: en-US, es-ES, fr-FR, pt-BR
language.title: Language

country_code.description: Pass the user s country to see rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.
country_code.title: Country Code

rate_identifier.description: A toggle to show if rate identifier is being passed. Valid Options: 0 = false, 1 = true. Rate is a string that is set for each hotel and holds all the information regarding the rate that we send to priceline.
rate_identifier.title: Rate Identifier

ppn_bundle.description: ppn_bundle is a unique ID that ppn uses to identify a specific rate
ppn_bundle.title: Ppn Bundle
